results.title: Targeting epidermal lipids for treatment of Mendelian disorders of cornification
results.text_hl: This therapy is inexpensive and accessible to every @SPECIES_9606 @@@patient@@@ with @<m>DISEASE_Congenital_Hemidysplasia_with_Ichthyosiform_Erythroderma_and_Limb_Defects</m> @DISEASE_MESH:C562515 @@@CHILD syndrome@@@, because both @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ and @CHEMICAL_Cholesterol @CHEMICAL_MESH:D002784 @@@cholesterol@@@ are available worldwide.
